text: The 1998 Hart Council election took place on 7 May 1998 to elect members of Hart District Council in Hampshire, England. One third of the council was up for election and the council stayed under no overall control. After the election, the composition of the council was *Liberal Democrat 15 *Conservative 14 *Independent 6 ==Election result== ==Ward results== ==References== 1998 Category:1998 English local elections Category:1990s in Hampshire
title: 1998 Hart District Council election
